-1.title: Charlie's Back!
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Blarney Stone
1.plot: Construction expert Charlie Frattini and his top-notch crew try to save the Blarney Stone Bar and Restaurant, a New York City institution that's been struggling since the 9/11 attack on their neighboring Twin Towers.

2.title: Just Wingin' It
2.plot: Charlie and his crew help Harlem New York City Fire Fighter and local hero Walter Lewis save his neighborhood Hot Wing Shop after a bad construction job forced him to go out of business indefinitely.

3.title: Al di la
3.plot: Charlie and his crew help the Anfuso family which has suffered over the last three years with incompetent and untrustworthy contractors who have drained all of the their finances.

4.title: Botta de vino
4.plot: Charlie helps newlyweds Jeff and Triciann who are broke and frustrated after spending this past year and their life savings trying to open dream wine shop in Red Hook Brooklyn New York.

5.title: Locale
5.plot: Father and Son team Joe Sr. and Joe Jr. want to open a hip lounge in Staten Island NY, but after six months of renovations their club is still in ruins. Charlie and his crew transform this hazard zone into a swanky hot spot.

6.title: Real Deal Barbershop
6.plot: Charlie and his crew help small businessman Fred Robinson save his struggling barbershop. Fred has been cutting hair for thirty years and helping generations of young men and woman stay off the streets.

7.title: Inwood Boxing Academy
7.plot: Charlie and his construction team head to upper Manhattan to rescue Joe Brender's Inwood Boxing Academy from falling apart. Charlie builds a new state of the art facility filled with all new gym equipment and boxing ring.

8.title: S.T.A.R.S Youth Center
8.plot: Charlie and his crew are in Howard Beach New York to renovate a crumbling youth center in a century old building that provides day care services and after-school programs for over 100 families in this community.

imdb.plot outline: On Construction Intervention, construction guru Charlie Frattini and his crew tackle real life property improvement nightmares. Every close-ended episode sees Charlie and team travel to a different location to rescue business owners that are in the midst of derailed construction projects. Charlie meets with the victims of the renovation disaster, does a walk through of the space, assesses the damage and then whips the culprits into shape. He identifies all of the flaws in their work ethic, shows them better ways of accomplishing the tasks and forces them to finish the job they started. Charlie uses his construction expertise to undo the damage and bring the property back from the brink of total destruction.
imdb.title: Construction Intervention
plot: On _Construction Intervention_ (qv), construction guru Charlie Frattini and his crew tackle real life property improvement nightmares. Every close-ended episode sees Charlie and team travel to a different location to rescue business owners that are in the midst of derailed construction projects. Charlie meets with the victims of the renovation disaster, does a walk through of the space, assesses the damage and then whips the culprits into shape. He identifies all of the flaws in their work ethic, shows them better ways of accomplishing the tasks and forces them to finish the job they started. Charlie uses his construction expertise to undo the damage and bring the property back from the brink of total destruction.
